mapper.insert: insert into service_form(brand, computer_model, cpu_model, has_discrete_graphics, graphics_model, laptop_type, bought_time, is_under_warranty, problem_description, problem_type, service_event_id) values (#{form.brand}, #{form.computerModel}, #{form.cpuModel}, #{form.hasDiscreteGraphics}, #{form.graphicsModel}, #{form.laptopType}, #{form.boughtTime}, #{form.underWarranty}, #{form.problemDescription}, #{form.problemType}, #{form.serviceEventId})
mapper.select: select id, brand, computer_model, cpu_model, has_discrete_graphics, graphics_model, laptop_type, bought_time, is_under_warranty, problem_description, problem_type, reply_user_id, description_advice, status from service_form where id = #{id}
